name: John McGregor
content: John McGregor's Home Page Welcome to the Web page of John D. McGregor WEA presentation. Vita. Citations at Google Scholar. My Photos. My research group's new homepage. My Books. Research Interests . Current Courses. Links to my column on Strategic Software Engineering for the Journal of Object Technology (JOT). Copies of My JOOP column on Testing and Quality. Download a pdf version of my Building Reusable Test Assets for a Product Line. The Software Product Line Conference (SPLC). Sample Product Line. Testing Method Definition. SYSE Program Flyer for 2012. Multi-scale Modeling of Single Ventricle Hearts for Clinical Decision Support Software Engineering Radio Department of Computer Science 312 McAdams Hall Clemson University Clemson, South Carolina (864)656-5859 johnmc@cs.clemson.edu Department of Computer Science Home Page Clemson University Home Page
